Starc to Jamshed, 1 run pitched full again outside off, and driven with an open face down to square third man, hint of straightening in the air late on the delivery

Starc to Hafeez, 2 runs bowled full, and Hafeez attacks it, does not quite get hold of the swing, and the ball swirls high over point, and third man eventually gets around to it, quite a stubborn outfield this
Starc to Hafeez, FOUR runs poor line, fired in full and wide down the pads, whipped away happily in the air to the fine leg rope
Starc to Hafeez, no run very full outside off, and squeezed out to point
Starc to Hafeez, 1 run nicely bowled, almost in the blockhole around off, dabbed softly down to third man

Pattinson to Hafeez, SIX runs that is an outstanding stroke from a batsman who has struggled for timing throughout his innings, short of a length, almost as if he was waiting for it, Hafeez stands in the crease and wallops it high over midwicket, there is a man
Pattinson to Hafeez, no run worked to midwicket

Pattinson to Hafeez, 1 run ends up hitting it in the air towards vacant mid on as he shuffles across to a length ball
Pattinson to Jamshed, FOUR runs shot! this man has very fast reaction time, not that short, on the pads, he explodes into a violent pull and sends it behind square leg
Christian to Hafeez, 1 run widish length ball, he reaches out and dabs it towards point
Christian to Jamshed, FOUR runs bit close but authoritative, down the track, makes some room for the swing, and lofts the length ball over extra cover, who leaps but in vain
Christian to Jamshed, 1 wide sent wide down the leg side now

Christian to Hafeez, 1 run walks across and works a full ball from off through square leg

Pattinson to Hafeez, SIX runs crunch! length ball, Hafeez takes a step forward and murders it high and straight down the ground

Johnson to Jamshed, no run appeal for caught behind down the leg side as Jamshed misses a pull off a short ball angled in, Clarke going upstairs, neat take from the keeper to his right, it has flicked the shirt just above the waist, that caused the sound, and Au
Johnson to Jamshed, OUT another short ball, and this time he's got him, Mitch smiles widely, sharp sharp bouncer head high, Jamshed tried to hook, keeper takes it safely
Johnson to Afridi, 1 wide angled across, wide outside off, too far

Pakistan were 140 for 1 in the 29th over. Honest. Shows just how well the openers, Hafeez and Jamshed, batted. Jamshed was in good nick, but Hafeez had a huge struggle initially. To his credit, he battled it out and prospered. And despite all the criticism he gets from
Back for the Australia chase. David Hussey is opening the innings in place of Wade, along with Warner. Junaid with the first new ball
Junaid to Warner, no run and beats him first up, holds its line widish outside off, back of a length, Warner hops across, prods at it
Junaid to Warner, 1 run nips in short of a length into the pads, away through square leg
Junaid to Hussey, no run good length, left alone with the angle outside off
Junaid to Hussey, 1 run down the pads, and worked wide of fine leg
Junaid to Warner, no run shuffles across and outside off, and bends forward to defend down the pitch
Junaid to Warner, no run pitched up, pushed hard into the pitch, fielded by a leaping Junaid in his followthrough
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run spins in, good length, worked in front of square
Hafeez to Warner, FOUR runs too short, sitting up outside off, Warner clobbers it past extra cover
Hafeez to Warner, no run this one was not as short, skidded on as well, Warner tried a similar shot, and mistimed it to point
Hafeez to Warner, no run straightens on middle and leg, worked to short midwicket
Hafeez to Warner, no run goes back to a length ball, which hurries on for middle, gets the bat down just in time
Hafeez to Warner, 1 run jabs forward to push down to long off
Junaid to Warner, 1 run short of a length forced to midwicket from the crease for a sharp single
Junaid to Hussey, no run skiddy and fullish on middle and leg, stabbed down the pitch
Junaid to Hussey, no run stays back and drives on the up, straight to extra cover
Junaid to Hussey, 1 run drives hard but mid off slides across to save some runs, and gets the throw in quickly too, which misses at the non-striker's, Malik it was
Junaid to Warner, FOUR runs launched in front of square leg, not that short, did not get up much, Warner arched back and heaved it over the infield
Junaid to Warner, FOUR runs another one, Warner lofts over point now, gets forward and lifts the pitched up delivery with an open face
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run goes back, opens up and punches with the spin to long on
Hafeez to Warner, no run lunges forward to push a full one to the bowler
Hafeez to Warner, no run lovely, angled in on off stump, he pushes forward, and the ball spins across the edge

Hafeez to Warner, no run hello, Warner prepares himself for the switch hit, he also turns around into a right-handed batsman, Hafeez is upto it, fires it across, and Warner has to block outside his, now off, stump
Hafeez to Warner, no run pushed back to the bowler
Hafeez to Warner, no run cut to point
Abdur to Hussey, no run flat, good length, punched to extra cover off the back foot
Abdur to Hussey, 1 run drives off the front foot to wide long off
Abdur to Warner, no run flat, shortish, and fired in, pulled straight to short fine leg, lucky for the bowler
Abdur to Warner, no run quick and spinning in, pushed to short midwicket
Abdur to Warner, no run that is really fast, short of a length, bouncing, defended to leg
Abdur to Warner, SIX runs Warner ruins what had turned out to be a tight over, goes down on a knee and slog-sweeps hard and miles over deep square leg

Hafeez to Hussey, SIX runs now Hussey with the slog-sweep, aggressive approach from Australia against spin, flighted, just outside off, Hussey lunges forward, bends the knee and mows it over deep midwicket
Hafeez to Hussey, no run flicked with the spin behind square leg
Hafeez to Hussey, SIX runs and again, the intent is clear from Australia, another slog-sweep, reaching out farther forward, fetching it further outside off, and depositing it over deep midwicket
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run worked to deep square leg
Hafeez to Warner, no run makes room to a skiddy one on middle and punches hard to extra cover
Hafeez to Warner, no run thick inside edge as he tentatively pokes across at one outside off, away to short fine leg
Abdur to Hussey, no run thick inside edge of a drive to short midwicket
Abdur to Hussey, no run another attempted extra-cover drive, again to short midwicket, who dives to stop it
Abdur to Hussey, 1 run pitched up, eases it straight down the ground to long off
Abdur to Warner, no run miscues another slog-sweep this time, through with the shot too early, off the toe end of the bat, and falling short of short midwicket
Abdur to Warner, no run fired in flat and shortish, punched back to the bowler
Abdur to Warner, no run very fast outside off, he adjusts to push out to covers
Hafeez to Hussey, no run had a thought about the slog sweep again, then saw it bowled across from round the stumps, tried to push at it, beaten
Hafeez to Hussey, 2 runs false shot, but just over mid off, reaches out to a flighted ball and pushes it in the air, Junaid tried but could not get to the ball
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run in the air again, this time just past Hafeez and to long on
Hafeez to Warner, no run stands several feet outside leg, the ball arrives on middle and leg, pushed to covers
Hafeez to Warner, no run fired in, rolls off the pads to square leg, some confusion as they go for the single
Hafeez to Warner, no run defended off the front foot
Abdur to Hussey, 1 run dropped Afridi at mid on, Hussey heaves a flighted ball, it flies in the air, Afridi leaps high and gets both hands to it, it pops out
Abdur to Warner, no run walks across and down the pitch, defends
Abdur to Warner, no run appeal for leg before turned down, hit on the pads as he misses a slog-sweep, was headed down leg
Abdur to Warner, no run pushed to covers

Abdur to Warner, OUT gone, too much of the same thing, fired in just shortish, Warner winds up for another heave, but the ball bounces and gets slightly big on him, and mid on runs back to take it over his head, Rehman is pumped up
Abdur to Clarke, 1 run flighted full on middle and leg, whipped to midwicket
Hafeez to Clarke, 1 run uses his feet right away, and eases it to long on with the spin
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run goes back to force it behind square leg
Hafeez to Clarke, no run comes down the pitch again, finds midwicket from outside off
Hafeez to Clarke, 1 run fired in down the pads, worked behind square leg, man from the deep runs across hard and keeps them to one
Hafeez to Hussey, 2 runs pulled hard over midwicket, long on cuts it off, Hussey has to hurry back for the second
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run length ball whipped through square leg
Abdur to Hussey, 1 run drives a flighted full ball past the bowler's dive to long off
Abdur to Clarke, FOUR runs down the pitch, it is fired in full, and he gets enough on it to tickle it fine down leg
Abdur to Clarke, 1 run
Abdur to Hussey, no run delays the drive for a bit as this one is bowled slightly slower and finds extra cover
Abdur to Hussey, no run pushed to extra cover
Abdur to Hussey, 1 run some width outside off, punched to sweeper cover
Afridi to Hussey, no run bowled full on the stumps, whipped to midwicket
Afridi to Hussey, 1 run into the pads, nudged fine down leg
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run tossed up full, eased down to long on
Afridi to Hussey, 1 run straightens outside off, punched out to sweeper cover
Afridi to Clarke, no run appeal for leg before, Clarke uncertainly pushing forward, pad first and then bat as it skids on, looked to be hit clearly outside the line of off though
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run down the track next ball and whips in front of square leg
Junaid to Clarke, no run hurled in full, hit back hard, fielded awkwardly
Junaid to Clarke, no run pitched up and driven solidly to mid on with the angle
Junaid to Clarke, FOUR runs he's hit that really hard, pitched up full and wide outside off, slow, Clarke delays the shot and lofts it cleanly over mid off for a one-bounce four
Junaid to Clarke, 2 runs opens the face and runs it wide of third man, they go back for the second, Hussey wold have been gone had the throw hit
Junaid to Clarke, 1 run pushes a full one down to long off
Junaid to Hussey, 2 runs slams a wide and full one to the right of sweeper cover
Afridi to Clarke, no run right forward to defend down the pitch
Afridi to Clarke, no run leaves the crease to a tossed up ball and defends
Afridi to Clarke, 2 runs skips out, drives wide of sweeper cover, makes Hussey go for the second again, the throw hits this time, but Hussey is safely in
Afridi to Clarke, no run down the track again, drives hard down the pitch, Afridi stops it
Afridi to Clarke, no run straightens outside off, chops the cut to point
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run drives a tossed up ball to mid off
Junaid to Clarke, 1 run pitched up, he gets forward and drives down to long off
Junaid to Hussey, 1 run steered to third man for one
Junaid to Clarke, no run down the track, and pushes a length ball to mid on
Junaid to Clarke, FOUR runs driven very hard, angled across widish, Clarke reaches out and slams it out of the reach of sweeper cover
Junaid to Clarke, 1 run reaches out again and pushes down to long off
Junaid to Hussey, no run tries to pull a short ball but it whizzes past
Ajmal to Clarke, no run turns in from outside off, pushed with a straight bat to midwicket

Ajmal to Clarke, no run ripper of a doosra, and Clarke has no answer, plays for the turn and overbalances as he comes forward, the ball just misses off, Kamran fails to gather it, Clarke's foot could have been in the air, very briefly
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run hares down the track, and the ball rolls to leg off pad
Ajmal to Hussey, no run skiddy one worked square on the leg side
Ajmal to Hussey, no run hangs in the air for a bit and goes straight, Hussey had no idea, and ended up prodding inside the line

Ajmal to Hussey, no run big offspinner, appeal for leg before, seemed to have been struck outside the line of off as he came across and outside, they confer about a review, Kamran does not look convinced, and they decide against it
Abdur to Clarke, FOUR runs and Clarke takes him on right away, skips out, get to the pitch, and whips it from off high over midwicket
Abdur to Clarke, no run almost pushed straight back to the bowler, comes out, and pushes at a fullish one, the ball bounces inches before Rehman's hands
Abdur to Clarke, no run
Abdur to Clarke, no run defended solidly off the front foot
Abdur to Clarke, no run starts to come out, stops as it is bowled flat, and runs it to point
Abdur to Clarke, 1 run fired in full, worked to deep square
Ajmal to Clarke, no run straighter one bouncing around off, defended quietly

Ajmal to Clarke, 1 wide, OUT got him, that instinct for skipping out gets the captain, sharp work from Kamran, Clarke misses the work to leg as the good length offbreak spins in past his pads, and Kamran is in position to take the ball and whip the bails off, Aj
Ajmal to Hussey, no run pushes forward and eases it to a diving extra cover
Ajmal to Hussey, no run pushed out to backward point
Ajmal to Hussey, no run punched from the crease to mid off

Ajmal to Hussey, no run has to be close, appeal for lbw turned down by umpire Bowden, Pakistan decide no to review, that looked gone on first look, and replays show Pakistan should have reviewed it, Hussey going back to one that skidded in from a length from rou
Ajmal to Hussey, no run defended off the front foot
Abdur to Hussey, 1 run
Abdur to Hussey, no run spinning in from outside off, worked to midwicket
Abdur to Hussey, no run worked to midwicket from deep in the crease
Abdur to Hussey, no run pushed back to the bowler
Abdur to Hussey, no run flat and quick, played out to midwicket
Abdur to Hussey, no run skidding in around off, punched to the bowler off the back foot
Ajmal to Hussey, no run doosra, this is really a masterclass, straightens sharply outside off, Hussey reaching forward inside the line, beaten
Ajmal to Hussey, 1 run works an offspinner behind square leg
Ajmal to Hussey, no run uncertain which way it is going, late on the offbreak, pushed back to the bowler
Ajmal to Hussey, no run offspinner punched back to the bowler from the crease
Ajmal to Hussey, no run good work, keeps Mike on strike, as he puts his boot out to a drive down the track
Ajmal to Hussey, 1 run drives a full ball down to long off
Hafeez to Hussey, SIX runs and he is welcomed first ball with a huge slog-sweep, full on middle and off, and carted high over deep midwicket, onto the roof, how many balls will we lose today?
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run punched to long on
Hafeez to Hussey, no run punched to covers from the crease
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run worked in front of square leg off the pad
Hafeez to Hussey, no run straightens on middle, defended to leg
Hafeez to Hussey, no run defended down the track
Ajmal to Hussey, SIX runs one more six, this time off Ajmal, leans forward to a full offbreak and lofts it very cleanly, superb timing, over deep midwicket
Ajmal to Hussey, no run shuffles across and works to midwicket
Ajmal to Hussey, no run goes across and punches an offbreak down the pitch

Ajmal to Hussey, OUT Ajmal has one more, and David Hussey's perky innings is over, leaned forward for the strike over deep midwicket again, but found wide long on instead, credit to Ajmal for tossing it up again after being hit for six earlier in the over
Ajmal to Hussey, no run almost got the brother next ball, reaches forward tentatively to a tossed up offspinner, edged with soft hands short of slip
Ajmal to Hussey, 1 run worked behind square leg for one
Hafeez to Hussey, no run fine scrambling stop to his left from Hafeez to stop a firm push
Hafeez to Hussey, no run floated up full on leg, defended
Hafeez to Hussey, no run appeal for lbw from Hafeez now, two sounds as Hussey went back in the crease, looked to be an inside edge
Hafeez to Hussey, no run
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run drives a full ball to long off
Hafeez to Bailey, 1 run punched from the crease wide of covers

Ajmal to Bailey, no run not given, another leg before appeal turned down by umpire Bowden, huge offspinner turns in and strikes him on pad in the crease, could have been headed down leg with the angle, it was, as replays show, fine decision not to review
Ajmal to Bailey, no run wants to paddle now from outside off, misses, and is hit on the pad
Ajmal to Bailey, no run punched to midwicket
Ajmal to Bailey, no run straight on now outside off, he shuffles across and is beaten as he prods inside the line

Ajmal to Bailey, OUT confusion, too much confusion, they have no clue what is hitting them, Australia, trying the sweep as a release stroke, doosra again, straightens on the middle stump, gloved in the air, slip has already moved to leg slip in anticipation of t

Ajmal to Wade, no run hello, another lbw appeal, and another one turned down, and again Pakistan don't review, Wade goes back in the crease and is caught on the pad, was that sliding down? yes, it was
Afridi to Hussey, 1 run
Afridi to Wade, no run quick and full on the stumps, blocked
Afridi to Wade, no run spins in a tad from outside off, defended
Afridi to Wade, no run quick and worked out to square leg
Afridi to Wade, no run a slower legbreak now, spins in and bounces from the rough outside off, beats him on the cut
Afridi to Wade, 1 run pushed hard down to long on
Hafeez to Wade, no run left alone outside off
Hafeez to Wade, no run punched back to the bowler
Hafeez to Wade, 1 run another one forced down, this time to long on
Hafeez to Hussey, no run worked to midwicket
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run goes deep to work it in front of square leg
Hafeez to Wade, no run length ball punched down the track from the crease
Afridi to Hussey, no run Afridi dives to his left trying to stop the push, he goes at it right-handed, the left one is injured, midwicket backs up
Afridi to Hussey, 1 run pulled to deep midwicket
Afridi to Wade, 1 run bowled quick and flat outside off, punched through point
Afridi to Hussey, 1 run bends his knee, swivels and swings it around the corner to fine leg
Afridi to Wade, 1 run driven hard down to sweeper cover
Afridi to Hussey, no run that was fast, that was hurled in at some pace, pushed to the off side
Hafeez to Wade, no run leans forward to defend to extra cover
Hafeez to Wade, no run didn't carry to slip, lovely delivery, drifts in, turns across the forward push, takes the edge, but falls short of Misbah, who smiles calmly
Hafeez to Wade, 2 runs top-edged sweep off one fired in, fine leg is deep
Hafeez to Wade, no run punched off the back foot to extra cover
Hafeez to Wade, 1 run punched from the crease to long off
Hafeez to Hussey, no run hangs in the air for a bit more, defended down the pitch off a thick inside edge
Afridi to Wade, no run that is a fast bowler's delivery, 125 kph, fullish length, pushed back to the bowler
Afridi to Wade, no run flat, swept to short fine leg
Afridi to Wade, no run slightly slower, just under 100 kph by Boom Boom standards, defended off the front foot
Afridi to Wade, 1 run lot slower, tossed up too, eased down to long on
Afridi to Hussey, 1 run down to long on for one more
Afridi to Wade, 1 run opens the face and runs it to backward point
Azhar Ali to Wade, 1 run down the track and pushes to long on

Azhar Ali to Hussey, 1 run full again, driven to long off
Azhar Ali to Wade, no run lunges forward to defend
Azhar Ali to Wade, 1 run looks to sweep a full toss, inside edge past the stumps down leg
Azhar Ali to Hussey, FOUR runs floated across, and that has been crashed through extra cover, past the dive of the fielder in the ring
Afridi to Wade, no run full ball slapped away to extra cover
Afridi to Wade, no run squeezed out, again to extra cover
Afridi to Wade, FOUR runs swept hard, through the square leg umpire's legs for four
Afridi to Wade, no run turning in a bit from outside off, patted back to the bowler
Afridi to Wade, no run phew, he is just hurling them in, stabbed towards short third man
Afridi to Wade, 1 run nudged softly in front of square leg
Azhar Ali to Wade, no run works a tossed up full ball to midwicket
Azhar Ali to Wade, no run seemed like a wrong 'un, played out softly
Azhar Ali to Wade, no run straightens on off, patted back off the front foot,
Azhar Ali to Wade, 1 wide and Kamran misses a stumping, Wade walks out to one going down leg quickly, but Kamran fails to gather, Azhar has his hand on his face in anguish
Azhar Ali to Wade, no run
Azhar Ali to Wade, 1 run smashes the sweep off a full ball on leg behind square
Azhar Ali to Hussey, 1 run swept again, through square leg
Afridi to Hussey, 1 run works a tossed up ball from outside off through midwicket
Afridi to Wade, no run slapped off the back foot, Misbah gets down to his right to field
Afridi to Wade, 1 run drives a full ball to long on
Afridi to Hussey, 1 run rocks back and pulls hard to deep square
Afridi to Wade, 1 run cuts a flat delivery well to backward point, fine stop by Hafeez
Afridi to Hussey, 1 run full on leg, worked through square
Azhar Ali to Hussey, 1 run knocked down to long on for a single
Azhar Ali to Wade, no run hit hard down the ground, good stop by the bowler to his right
Azhar Ali to Wade, 1 run eases a flighted ball angled across past point
Azhar Ali to Hussey, 2 runs he tries a forcing reverse sweep now, from around leg stump, and gets it past short third man who pulls it back late with a slide near the rope
Azhar Ali to Hussey, no run played out softly towards point
Azhar Ali to Hussey, 1 run full, driven down to long off
Afridi to Hussey, 1 run another easy single to long on
Afridi to Wade, 1 run spins in sharply, worked to square leg
Afridi to Hussey, FOUR runs full toss now and it is clipped forcingly through midwicket
Afridi to Hussey, 1 run wide one floated across, carved to sweeper cover
Afridi to Wade, 1 run low full toss pushed to long off
Afridi to Hussey, FOUR runs that was very fast, angled across on a length, widish outside off, and steered past short third man, not been a happy day for Afridi
Abdur to Wade, no run goes across and pushes a length ball sliding in, down the track
Abdur to Wade, no run appeal for lbw as he misses the sweep, going down leg as it was angled in from over the stumps

Abdur to Wade, OUT there is the breakthrough, Rehman has done it for Pakistan, big gap between bat and pad as Wade pushes forward eagerly to a flighted length ball, it spins in through the gate and strikes off
Abdur to Maxwell, no run defended off the front foot around middle
Abdur to Maxwell, 1 run fired in flat and worked behind square leg, who dives to stop the ball with one hand, Imran Farhat
Abdur to Hussey, no run worked straight to midwicket
Hafeez to Maxwell, 1 run pushed off the front foot towwards covers

Hafeez to Hussey, no run appeal from the keeper for leg before, not from the bowler, that looked very close, hit in front of middle as this one straightened sharply from middle and leg, was it too high? ball tracker says it was
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run down the track and lofted on the bounce to long off
Hafeez to Maxwell, 1 run pulled hard behind square leg
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run worked to short fine leg off the pad
Hafeez to Maxwell, 1 run
Abdur to Maxwell, 4 leg byes misses the sweep as this one is floated full on the pads, and off them fine down leg
Abdur to Maxwell, 1 run
Abdur to Hussey, 1 run worked down to long on from the crease
Abdur to Maxwell, 1 run full one worked through midwicket
Abdur to Hussey, 1 run low full toss hit down to long on
Abdur to Maxwell, 1 run worked from outside off to square leg, Farhat charges in but misses the pick-up
Ajmal to Maxwell, no run hit on the pad first ball as he fails to work an offspinner to leg, bounces onto his chin
Ajmal to Maxwell, 1 run pushed to extra cover, direct hit at the striker's, but Maxweel has made his ground long back
Ajmal to Hussey, 1 run straightens on middle, and worked through midwicket
Ajmal to Maxwell, 2 runs punches an offspinner in front of square on off, Rehman's dive cannot stop the ball
Ajmal to Maxwell, 1 run plays the tossed up doosra well, drives to sweeper cover with an open face
Ajmal to Hussey, 1 run offspinner around off, eases it with an open face to point
Abdur to Hussey, FOUR runs well done, sweeping powerfully from outside off, in the air and in the gap between deep square and deep midwicket
Abdur to Hussey, no run pushed back to the bowler
Abdur to Hussey, FOUR runs now he reverse sweeps, set himself up early, and dispatched it past short third man, that is fifty for Hussey
Abdur to Hussey, no run played out to midwicket
Abdur to Hussey, FOUR runs another one, reverse paddle from outside off, Afridi after it from short third man, slides and pulls it back in, but he seems to have touched the rope
Abdur to Hussey, no run defended off the front foot
Afridi to Maxwell, no run straightens on middle and leg, played out off the back foot
Afridi to Maxwell, 1 run misses the pull off a flat one, inside edge before it hits thigh pad in front, appeal for lbw turned down
Afridi to Hussey, 1 run worked in front of square leg
Afridi to Maxwell, 1 run slapped away to sweeper cover
Afridi to Hussey, 1 run tossed up slowly full outside off, slams the reverse sweep again, short third man dives and fields
Afridi to Maxwell, FOUR runs throws his bat at a full one outside off, thick edge flies past short third man, Afridi on his haunches
Ajmal to Hussey, 1 run straightens on middle, opens the face and runs it to point, direct hit would have been close for Hussey
Ajmal to Maxwell, no run offspinner rolls off the pad square to leg
Ajmal to Maxwell, 1 run offbreak turns in, carefully dabbed to short third man
Ajmal to Hussey, 1 wide fired in wide down the leg side
Ajmal to Hussey, 1 run delays the forward movement to a tossed up offspinner and pushes it towards covers for a sharp run, throw misses again

Ajmal to Maxwell, no run there is the tossed up doosra, and this time Kamran is sharp in taking the bails off, Maxwell lured out in a forward prod, the ball sneaks past the outside edge, the back foot, to me, seems to be slightly in the air as Kamran takes the b
Ajmal to Maxwell, 2 runs charges out a to a flighted, full and wide one and drills it through extra cover, it slows up near the rope
Afridi to Hussey, 1 run swings a sweep flat and on the bounce to deep square leg
Afridi to Maxwell, SIX runs that is big, he has got down on a knee and swung a full delivery powerfully behind square leg, and it has gone all the way
Afridi to Maxwell, FOUR runs Afridi has had a forgettable game, a late dab this time to send the ball racing past short third man
Afridi to Maxwell, 1 run pushed towards point, Malik slips as he runs in, they complete the single safely
Afridi to Hussey, no run slower through the air, played out to midwicket
Afridi to Hussey, FOUR runs full outside off and Afridi goes for four more, reverse sweep again from Hussey, what a gem he's played, always in control of the stroke, past short third man
Ajmal to Maxwell, no run full one patted down the track
Ajmal to Maxwell, no run spins in sharply and hits him on the pad in the crease, going down leg
Ajmal to Maxwell, 2 runs opens the face slightly, he has looked alright against the doosra, runs it towards third man
Ajmal to Maxwell, no run appeal for caught-and-bowled, Ajmal runs forward to take the ball as it pops up off pad as Maxwell pushes out
Ajmal to Maxwell, no run defends the flighted doosra softly and late off the front foot
Ajmal to Maxwell, 1 run gets it very full and drills it down to long on
Junaid to Maxwell, 1 run dropped, Pakistan falling apart now, short ball pulled off the front foot straight to Azhar at deep midwicket, he scrambles awkwardly and puts it down
Junaid to Hussey, no run drives a full ball to short extra cover
Junaid to Christian, no run runs a length ball outside off to point
Junaid to Christian, no run that stayed very low, from back of a length, he was looking to pull initially, but it hardly got up, fortunately it was outside off
Junaid to Christian, 1 run length ball worked down to long on
Ajmal to Christian, no run pops in the air to off as he jabs forward to a length ball
Ajmal to Christian, no run stifled appeal for lbw as he comes forward and is hit in front of leg, turning in too much, and down leg
Ajmal to Christian, 1 run straight length ball punched wide of midwicket
Ajmal to Maxwell, SIX runs Maxwell impresses again, gets front foot out to a flighted one outside off and lofts it cleanly all the way over extra cover with a straight followthrough

Ajmal to Maxwell, FOUR runs and again, through extra cover, Clarke claps in the pavilion as Maxwell gets inside the line of a tossed up doosra on middle, exposes all the stumps, and drills it past extra cover, boy, he is playing Ajmal like he has dealt with him
Ajmal to Maxwell, no run defended solidly off the front foot
Junaid to Maxwell, FOUR runs Maxwell keeps clobbering them, on the front foot, swings a length ball hard behind square leg
Junaid to Maxwell, 1 run he has a heave at this pitched up ball, thick inside edge to deep midwicket, the Australia dressing room claps whole-heartedly, for Maxwell's maiden ODI 50
Junaid to Johnson, 1 run full into the pads, worked to fine leg
Junaid to Maxwell, no run opens the face and drills a full delivery hard to point
Junaid to Maxwell, SIX runs there it is, Maxwell launches a full slower one high over wide long on as Australia takes the series 2-1, sees it disappear, pumps his fist and roars

Pakistan had their chances. They didn't review against Michael Hussey when he was plumb in front on 0. He turned the game around with Maxwell and Wade. Misbah took Ajmal off after he had bowled five overs for three wickets. Could he have given him another? Kamran misse

There were reservations expressed by Australia and their players' association on the extreme conditions for this series. But how well have their players responded. They threw themselves around in the field today, fast bowlers included.

We should be a seeing a lot of this Maxwell in the future. He hardly seems to be batting in the pressure of the No 7 position, and he was totally comfortably against Ajmal. You can say that about very few batsman in world cricket.
A proud Australia pose with the series trophy.
That is all from us for this game. Abhishek Purohit signing off. Cheers.
Australia won by 3 wickets (with 18 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Michael Hussey, AUS
